subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: An afternoon that was supposed to be a coronation of greatness for Big Brown ended in an upset, and with questions anew about an industry that rests on the fragile limbs of racehorses.
snippet: An afternoon that was supposed to be a coronation of greatness for Big Brown ended in an upset, and with questions anew about an industry that rests on the fragile limbs of racehorses.
